awd_titl_txt: Quiet-time Geomagnetic Field Variations , Sq in Antarctica
awd_abstract_narration: This project, which is partially supported by a fund transfer to                USGS, will collate magnetometer data collected over the past 33                 years (since the IGY) at 27 different sites in Antarctica.  The                 purposes of the investigation are:                                                                                                                              1..                                                                            .To search for a response of the ionospheric E.region current                   system to the development of the annual ozone hole.  This is                    expected since the ozone controls stratospheric warming and                     consequently the thermal expansion of the atmosphere, which has                 a strong effect on upper atmospheric currents;.                                 H.                                                                                                                                                              2..                                                                            .To establish hemispherical differences in magnetic field                       variation behavior;.                                                            H.                                                                                                                                                              3..                                                                            .To evaluate the equivalent south polar region current systems                  for geomagneticly quiet days; and.                                              H.                                                                                                                                                              4..                                                                            .To determine the upper.mantle Earth electrical conductivity                    profile beneath the antarctic continent..                                       H.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: GEOLOGICAL SURVEY, UNITED STATES DEPT OF
